LanguageData.CFSettings_DebugTooltip: Enable debug logging, especially on load. You generally don't need to enable this unless asked to.
LanguageData.CFSettings_PPMTooltip: Whether to print all the Harmony patches which are successfully applied.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyAtOwnRisk: Disabling any patches may result in unpredictable behavior and features breaking. Only disable them if you know what you're doing!
LanguageData.CFSettings_DebugModeRequired: If debug mode is disabled, all patches will be applied.
LanguageData.CFSettings_RestartToApply: You must restart the game for patch settings to apply.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyOnHediffAddedPatch_Desc: allows certain hediffs to apply effects whenever another hediff is applied to the same pawn.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyCapacityPatch_Desc: allows the "caravan capacity" stat to work, which can be used to increase the maximum carry mass of a caravan.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyCompAffectedByFacilities: allows facilities to unlock recipes when attached to workbenches.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyCompFromStuffPatch_Desc: allows materials to add additional properties to things made from them.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyIgnorePathCostPatch_Desc: allows modders to make pawns ignore pathing costs.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyFacilityRequireFuelPatch: allows modders to create facilities which require fuel to operate.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyQualityUtilityPatch_Desc: allows modders to add conditions which affect the quality of crafted items.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyHatchPatch_Desc: allows pawns to be born into your faction from items.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyHealthTickPatch_Desc: allows certain hediffs to apply effects when each pawn performs its health tick.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyNegativeFertilityPatch_D: allows specific plants to grow faster in less fertile soil.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyShouldHaveNeedPatch_Desc: allows modders to make pawns ignore certain needs.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyMissingPartPatches_Desc: allows the framework to easily fix missing parts without causing errors.
LanguageData.CFSettings_ApplyOutputWorkerPatch_Desc: allows modders to run additional scripts whenever certain recipes are complete.
